name: Layers
description: Layers is a puzzle platformer that has a unique twist. A level is made of up the 2 different layers which can interact with each other in certain ways. Use this interaction to solve the puzzles and get all the characters to the exit doors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or Later Processor: Intel P4 or Greater Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
